description: ff. 140 (incomplete: several lacunae, end missing; some leaves in disorder - no custods). 240 x 173; 190 x 125 mm. 29 lin. 14th cen. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 667 (no. 3); S I, 921. Incip.: ... اللهم اعن وىسر ... قال ... الکلام فى المقدمات وفىه فصول
